name: to_ip
description: Converts an input string to an IP value.

params.name: field
params.description: Input value. The input can be a single- or multi-valued column or an expression.

params.description: Input value. The input can be a single- or multi-valued column or an expression.

params.name: field
params.description: Input value. The input can be a single- or multi-valued column or an expression.

examples:
ROW str1 = "1.1.1.1", str2 = "foo"
| EVAL ip1 = TO_IP(str1), ip2 = TO_IP(str2)
| WHERE CIDR_MATCH(ip1, "1.0.0.0/8")
